Question: Betty Friedan criticizes this person and what she considered his Victorian view of women in The Feminine Mystique.
Hints: This person acknowledged that his use of the term Id (das Es, "the It") derives from the writings of Georg Groddeck.
Fritz Perls, who helped to develop Gestalt therapy, was influenced by Reich, Jung and this person.
This person began his study of medicine at the University of Vienna in 1873.
